about.title: About me
about.education: IFCE - Federal Institute of Ceará, Aracati, Brazil
about.description: Bachelor in Computer Science from the Federal Institute of Ceará, Aracati. Web enthusiast, programmer since 12 years. Delphi to Javascript, a journey surrounded by enchantments of technology and a passion for the Front End. Currently in love with Vue, PostCSS and HTML5.
